title: Prime minister grieved over demise of Allama Agha Hamid Moosavi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday expressed grief over the demise of chief of Tehreek-e-Nifaz-e-Fiqh-e-Jafaria Allama Syed Hamid Ali Shah Moosavi.
The prime minister said that late Allama Moosavi was virtuous and an advocate of Muslim unity.
He prayed for peace of the departed soul and strength to the bereaved family and followers to bear the loss with fortitude.
